params.tag_line: Any student can connect with any alumni without sharing your contact details
params.about_tagline: AlumniConnect is the best way to connect with your college alumni.
params.about_text: AlumniConnect is the very first website to connect with alumni.
params.website_description:
Our AlumniConnect website is a web-enabled application through which students, and alumni will be able to continuously communicate. 
 This website is only for SRMIST Students as well as Alumni.
